ðŸ“– Summary: Kaliningraph is a Kotlin library implementing a graph computation model that can be translated to iterated matrix multiplication on GPUs. It supports backpropagation and aims to unify various message passing schemes. The library provides inductive definitions for graphs and circuits, enabling exploration of connections between different domains using algebraic graph theory.
